aka: Witches of Essex with Rylan and Prof Alice Roberts

cast.name: 爱丽丝·罗伯茨 Alice Roberts

this_title: Witches of Essex with Rylan and Alice Season 1
trans_title: Witches of Essex with Rylan and Prof Alice Roberts
introduction: Professor Alice Roberts and Rylan Clark delve into the most prolific spate of witch hunts in British history. Using new investigative techniques and expertise, the series explores the 16th and 17th century witch trials in Essex, a period when England launched an unprecedented state-sponsored attack on vulnerable women.PRODUCED BYMindhouse and GroupM Motion Entertainment
